name: Slim Selvedge Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

name: Regular Cargo Denim Joggers

Straight legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees, and covered elastication at the hems.

name: Relaxed Jeans
description: Lee x H&M. 5-pocket jeans in sturdy, washed denim made from recycled cotton. Regular waist, a zip fly and button and relaxed legs. Front pockets with an organic cotton lining and back pockets with Lee’s classic reinforcing X-stitches. Appliqué at the back in cork and jacron paper. Sewing thread made from recycled polyester and all metal details made without plating. The denim is made without the use of environmentally harmful chemicals in a more sustainable manufacturing process that reduces the amount of water consumed in comparison with conventional production methods.
